title: England XVs to take on New Zealand: Our writers pick their teams for Saturday's World Cup semi-final against the All Blacks
text:
After a comfortable 40-16 victory against Australia in the Rugby World Cup quarter finals, England face the daunting prospect of tackling a New Zealand side that has not lost a World Cup match since 2007.

There has even been talk of espionage at England's training sessions, with Eddie Jones saying: "There was definitely someone in the apartment block [overlooking the ground] filming."

Jones also turned up the heat on Steve Hansen's men by claiming "pressure is chasing the All Blacks down the street".

With all that in mind, our team of rugby writers have picked their XVs for this huge...
description: After a comfortable 40-16 victory against Australia in the Rugby World Cup quarter finals, England face the daunting prospect of tackling a New Zealand side that has not lost a World Cup match since 2007.
